text: Godɨn gumazamizir Babilonɨn(5:13a) Babilon arazir kurabagh amir nguibam. Ezɨ Pita Romɨn itir dughiam, Rom tintinimɨn arazir kurabar Godɨn gumazamizibagh ami, mati Babilon fomɨra me gamizir arazim moghɨn. Kamaghɨn Pita akar isɨn zuimɨn Rom dɨbora ghaze, Babilon. itiba, God me ko ia mɨsevezɨ, me ia bagha akam amaga ghaze, Afeziam ia ko ikɨ. Nan otarim, Mak, uaghan ia bagha akam amaga ghaze, Afeziam ia ko ikɨ.(5:13b) Mak guizɨn Polɨn otarim puvatɨ. A gumazir ighiar an akurvagha an gɨn aruim.
